title: Make Annie in Wonderland "Tibbers" a badass bunny (Like Cotton Tail Fizz R)
body:
I mean since they are basically remaking the skin and since the skin is a Legendary according to the client shop, i think they should make Tibbers a bunny, i get that Tibbers has to be a Bear because of the lore but like if super galaxy Annie has a ROBOT bear... i don't really think it's too far off making him a Demon bunny for Annie in Wonderland, because it fits more than a bear with bunny ears LOL. 

BTW the skin looks op now, thanks for the Update Riot Skin Team <3 
tho the Q could be instead of the same VFX of the W, a Tea Cup, like instead of throwing a blue cloud with particles and rainbows she could be Throwing a blue tea cup with... blue fire of something?

Think of it like a Cotton Tail Fizz "R" you know the demonic Bunny that comes out of it.

{{champion:1}}

replies.body:
>I mean since they are basically remaking the skin

They aren't remaking the skin... they are just updating her Visual Effects, which are the Particles that appear when certain actions occur (pushing a button)
The OG skin didnt had new effects tho, it was the same as the base skin

Yes, but they aren't changing anything else just the effects so they are more legendary tier.

I do wish they had the time to let an animator make a new recall / dance rather than adding some extra effects over those like they've done, that would really help bring it up.
The bunny of Fizz's cotton tail Fizz is Frank?

VFX artists aren't skin producers, the scope of the changes you're suggesting is cool, but that's visual update level work. 

Essentially this is something done in the free time between big skin releases like Volis VGU and Aphelios/Lunar skins launch.
